name: io.github.shinpr/mcp-image
description: AI image generation MCP server using Nano Banana with intelligent prompt enhancement

environment_variables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Google Gemini API key for image generation (get from https://aistudio.google.com/apikey)

environment_variables.name: IMAGE_OUTPUT_DIR
environment_variables.description: Absolute path to directory where generated images will be saved (defaults to ./output)

environment_variables.name: SKIP_PROMPT_ENHANCEMENT
environment_variables.description: Set to 'true' to disable automatic prompt optimization and use direct prompts
